des.superbwarfare.trachelium_2: "May the flowers in my hand convey my feelings to you"
des.superbwarfare.aurelia_sceptre_1: The ethereal fae, pearl-covered sceptre spans the universe
des.superbwarfare.aurelia_sceptre_2: "It is the cerulean ocean's lament, the lunar weeping on shores, the laughter crystallized amidst the crimson barrage"
des.superbwarfare.secondary_cataclysm_1: "Like the remnants after a shower of stars fall"
des.superbwarfare.guns.edit: Press %1$s key to edit this weapon
des.superbwarfare.ammo_box: When sneaking, left-click to switch ammo types, right-click to store that type of ammo. Right-click with out sneaking to take out the corresponding type of ammo
des.superbwarfare.creative_ammo_box: Provide infinite ammo when placed in inventory
des.superbwarfare.electric_baton: Right click while sneaking to switch electroshock mode
des.superbwarfare.crowbar: Right-click to open containers. Pick up vehicles when sneaking
des.superbwarfare.creative_charging_stat: Charge nearby entities and adjacent blocks, can also be used as a power source item
Successfully cleared energy from this item!
des.superbwarfare.vehicle_deployer: Right click with a container to set vehicle info. Summon a vehicle when triggered
des.superbwarfare.ap_bullet: Increased the armor-piercing ratio of bullets.
des.superbwarfare.silver_bullet: Deals extra damage to undead entities.
des.superbwarfare.beast_bullet: Ignore obstacles, Increase criteria area, Kill every living entity.
des.superbwarfare.poisonous_bullet: Makes the target poison after landing a hit.
des.superbwarfare.blade_bullet: Causes a target to start bleeding after being hit.
des.superbwarfare.curse_flame_bullet: Adds a curse flame affect on the target after hitting.
des.superbwarfare.longer_wire: Increases the range of the Taser's projectiles.
des.superbwarfare.jhp_bullet: Increases damage against unarmored targets, but the damage decreases rapidly as the armor value rises.
des.superbwarfare.butterfly_bullet: Replace fired bullets with Rain Shower Butterflies.
des.superbwarfare.bread_bullet: Deals extreme knockback and slowness to stuck mobs.
des.superbwarfare.micro_missile: Fires a high-speed projectile without gravity.
des.superbwarfare.cupid_arrow: Make the target fall in love after being hit. Deals no damage to living entities.
des.superbwarfare.heal_clip: Reloading after defeating a mob will heal you and your nearby allies.
des.superbwarfare.fourth_times_charm: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine.
des.superbwarfare.subsistence: Defeating mobs will partially reload your weapon's magazine.
des.superbwarfare.field_doctor: Bullets will heal allies whilst firing from the hip.
des.superbwarfare.regeneration: Energy weapons will restore energy automatically.
des.superbwarfare.turbo_charger: Reduces wind-up time for compatible weapons
des.superbwarfare.powerful_attraction: Experience and items dropped by slain mods will instantly be transferred to your inventory.
des.superbwarfare.intelligent_chip: Aims at enemies automatically (Do not use this in PVP mode)
des.superbwarfare.kill_clip: Increases the damage of weapon after dealing a final blow.
des.superbwarfare.killing_tally: Kills increase the weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded.
des.superbwarfare.head_seeker: Body shots landed with this weapon increase headshot damage for a short time.
des.superbwarfare.volt_overload: Increases shock damage of Taser Gun
des.superbwarfare.desperado: Reload after a headshot-kill will increase rate of fire.
des.superbwarfare.magnificent_howl: The number of precision final blows before reloading affects the total rounds granted with increased damage.
des.superbwarfare.firefly: Precision kills cause the target to explode with fire.
des.superbwarfare.use_tip.shortcut_pack: Synthesize firearms and shortcut kits at the anvil for one upgrade point
death.attack.laser_headshot.entity: %1$s's head was shot through by %2$s's laser
death.attack.vehicle_strike: %1$s can't be trusted behind the wheel
death.attack.air_crash.entity: %1$s was killed in the air by %2$s
death.attack.air_crash.item: %1$s was killed in the air by %2$s
death.attack.lunge_mine: %1$s was blown up by lunge mine
death.attack.lunge_mine.entity: %1$s was blown up by %2$s's lunge mine
death.attack.lunge_mine.item: %1$s was blown up by %2$s's lunge mine using %3$s
commands.config.collision_destroy.soft: Enabled vehicle collision destroy blocks (Soft Mode)
commands.config.collision_destroy.hard: Enabled vehicle collision destroy blocks (Hard Mode)
commands.config.collision_destroy.beastl: Enabled vehicle collision destroy blocks (Beastly Mode)
tips.superbwarfare.no_cloth_config: You have not installed Cloth Config API, cannot open the config interface
tips.superbwarfare.mortar.warn: This mortar cannot aim at this position
config.superbwarfare.title: SuperbWarfare: Config
config.superbwarfare.client.reload.left_: Tap the fire button to reload when the current clip is empty
config.superbwarfare.client.kill_message: Display killing message in the upper right corner when turned on
The kill indicator will appear around the collimator after a creature is killed when turned on
The base position of kill message
The horizontal offset of kill message
The vertical offset of kill message
config.superbwarfare.client.display.kill: The kill indicator will appear around the cross hair after a creature is killed when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.display.ammo: Display firearm and ammo information in the lower right corner when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.display.floa: The cross hair will follow the viewpoint to a certain extent when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.display.came: Slightly shaky view when holding a firearm in your hand
config.superbwarfare.client.display.armo: Display the durability of the bulletproof insert currently equipped on the chest armor in the lower left corner when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.display.stam: Display Stamina HUD when tactical sprinting or holding breath
config.superbwarfare.client.display.weap: The strength of the screen shake caused by weapons
config.superbwarfare.client.display.expl: The strength of the screen shake caused by explosions
config.superbwarfare.client.display.shoc: The strength of the screen shake caused by shock effect
config.superbwarfare.client.display.dog_: Whether to display the name of dog tag in kill messages
Whether to display the icon of dog tag in kill messages
config.superbwarfare.client.display.enab: Whether to enable gun lod in third person view
config.superbwarfare.client.display.weap: The horizontal offset of weapon HUD
The vertical offset of weapon HUD
config.superbwarfare.client.display.vehi: Whether to display vehicle info when aiming at a vehicle
config.superbwarfare.client.vehicle.left: Set TRUE to invert aircraft control
config.superbwarfare.common.gameplay.res: Whether to reload all weapons in the inventory after respawning automatically
config.superbwarfare.common.gameplay.glo: Whether to show a kill indication around the cross hair when killing a creature with only the damage type of this module
config.superbwarfare.common.gameplay.res: Whether to refill your armor plate after respawning automatically
des.superbwarfare.developing: This item is still under development
jei.superbwarfare.ancient_cpu: Mysterious ancient technology, can be found at ancient cities.
jei.superbwarfare.charging_station: Generates power by consuming fuel or food, and can also accept FE energy input. This block supplies FE energy to adjacent blocks, and can also charge rechargeable vehicles within range.
superbwarfare.advancement.main.best_frie: Maybe it shouldn't be your friend...
superbwarfare.advancement.main.ancient_t: Find a mysterious ancient technology in the ancient city
superbwarfare.advancement.main.hammer.de: Make a hammer to smash minerals into dust
superbwarfare.advancement.main.physics_e: Make a crowbar to crack open containers
superbwarfare.advancement.main.clean_ene: Make a charging station to charge your vehicles and batteries
superbwarfare.advancement.main.blueprint: Welcome to the era of firearms
superbwarfare.advancement.main.boomstick: Who said RPGs can't be baseball bats?
superbwarfare.advancement.main.rush_rush: The electric baton has to be paired with a wheelchair to deal damage, making it look as weak as a terminal superb soldier.

warning.check.example: I have read and agreed to the content. Do not show this message again
superbwarfare.book.superb_warfare_manual: A tutorial on Superb Warfare mod, teaching you how to become a superb soldier (WIP)
superbwarfare.category.weapon.des: Understand how to use Superb Warfare's weapons
superbwarfare.category.vehicle.des: Understand how to drive Superb Warfare's vehicles
superbwarfare.category.perk.des: Understand the function of Superb Warfare's perks
superbwarfare.category.misc.des: Understand how to use Superb Warfare's misc items
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.intro1: The vehicles in Superb Warfare are stored in $(item)Containers$() and need to be opened by a $(item)Crowbar$().$(p)Opening a container requires sufficient space. You can check the required space by aiming at the container when holding a crowbar.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.intro2: $(thing)Sneak and Right-Click$() an empty vehicle with a crowbar, you can store it into a container.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.intro3: Most of the vehicles need energy, you can charge them by $(item)Charging Station$().$(p)Right Click the Charging Station to open the GUI, charge it by putting $(thing)Fuels or Foods$() in the left grid. The Charging Station will automatically charge all vehicles in the range, and the right grid can be used to charge items.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.intro4: The Charging Station can also receive $(thing)FE$() from other mods.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.control1: $(o)"A driver must know how to drive!"$()$(br)--The Author$(p)This chapter introduces vehicle operations in Superb Warfare, helping you understand how to control vehicles.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.control2: $(l)Basic Controls: $()$(p)$(thing)$(k:key.use)$() - Enter vehicle$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.dismount)$() - Dismount (Double-tap to dismount from moving vehicles)$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.forward)$() - Forward$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.back)$() - Brake/Reverse$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.left) / $(k:key.right)$() - Steering/Roll$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.jump)$() - Brake$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.inventory)$() - Open vehicle inventory$(p)For vehicles with multiple seats: $(br)$(thing)$(k:key.sneak) + $(k:key.hotbar.1) ~ $(k:key.hotbar.9)$() - Switch Seats
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.control3: $(l)Weapon Controls: $()$(p)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.fire)$() - Fire$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.hold_zoom) / $(k:key.superbwarfare.switch_zoom)$() - Zoom$(br)$(thing)Mouse Wheel / $(k:key.hotbar.1) ~ $(k:key.hotbar.9)$() - Switch Weapons$(p)Available functions for certain vehicles: $(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.release_decoy)$() - Release decoy/smoke$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.free_camera)$() - Toggle free camera$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.jump)$() - Drop bombs
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.lav_1501: $(thing)LAV-150$() is a light wheeled IFV carrying 5 crew members, featuring basic armor protection and amphibious capabilities.$(p)Equipped with smoke generators to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing smoke grenades periodically.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.lav_1502: Requires at least 5 x 5 x 4 space for placement.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.lav_1503: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 250$(br)Max Passengers - 5$(br)Climbing Height - 1.5m$(br)Max Energy - 5,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 64FE/tick$(br)Enclosed Vehicle
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.lav_1504: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 20mm Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 300RPM$(br)Damage - 45$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Shells$()$(br)(2) 7.62mm Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 600RPM$(br)Damage - 9.5$(br)Ammo - $(item)Rifle Ammo$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.bmp_21: $(thing)BMP-2$() is a tracked IFV carrying 7 crew members, featuring good armor protection and amphibious capabilities.$(p)Equipped with smoke generators to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing smoke grenades periodically.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.bmp_22: Requires at least 5 x 5 x 4 space for placement.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.bmp_23: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 300$(br)Max Passengers - 7$(br)Climbing Height - 2.25m$(br)Max Energy - 5,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 64FE/tick$(br)Enclosed Vehicle
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.bmp_24: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 30mm Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 250RPM$(br)Damage - 55$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Shells$()$(br)(2) 7.62mm Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 750RPM$(br)Damage - 9.5$(br)Ammo - $(item)Rifle Ammo$()$(br)(3) 9M113 Missile Launcher$(br)Direct Damage - 700$(br)Explosion Damage - 60$(br)Explosion Radius - 6m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Wire Guide Missile$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_1001: $(thing)YX-100$() is a main battle tank carrying 3 crew members, featuring powerful armor protection but no amphibious capabilities.$(p)Equipped with smoke generators to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing smoke grenades periodically.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_1002: Requires at least 7 x 7 x 4 space for placement.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_1003: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 500$(br)Max Passengers - 3$(br)Climbing Height - 2.25m$(br)Max Energy - 20,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 128FE/tick$(br)Enclosed Vehicle (Position 1/2)
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_1004: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(br)Position 1: $(br)(1)  Large-caliber Railgun$(br)Fire Rate - 15RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 500$(br)Explosion Damage - 100$(br)Explosion Radius - 4m$(br)Ammo - $(item)AP Shell$()$(br)(2)  Large-caliber Railgun$(br)Fire Rate - 15RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 150$(br)Explosion Damage - 150$(br)Explosion Radius - 10m$(br)Ammo - $(item)HE Shell$()$(br)(3) 12.7mm Heavy Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 500RPM$(br)Damage - 25$(br)Ammo - $(item)Heavy Ammo$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_1005: Position 2: $(p)(1) 12.7mm Heavy Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 500RPM$(br)Damage - 25$(br)Ammo - $(item)Heavy Ammo$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_1006: Position 3: $(p)(1) Swarm Drone Launcher$(br)Fire Rate - 600RPM$(br)Explosion Damage - 80$(br)Explosion Radius - 5m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Swarm Drone$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.prism_tank1: $(thing)Prism Tank$() is a special-purpose tank carrying 2 crew members, featuring excellent armor protection but no amphibious capabilities.$(p)Equipped with smoke generators to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing smoke grenades periodically.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.prism_tank2: Requires at least 7 x 7 x 3 space for placement.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.prism_tank3: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 400$(br)Max Passengers - 2$(br)Climbing Height - 2.25m$(br)Max Energy - 20,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 96FE/tick$(br)Enclosed Vehicle (Position 1)
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.prism_tank4: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) Laser Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 30RPM$(br)Damage - 350$(br)Splash Damage - 72$(br)Splash Radius - 4m$(br)Energy Cost - 100,000FE$(br)(2) Laser$(br)Damage - 15$(br)Energy Cost - 5,000FE/tick
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.speedboat1: $(thing)Speedboat$() is a light vessel carrying 5 crew members, with weak armor protection.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.speedboat2: Requires at least 5 x 5 x 3 space for placement, can be placed directly on water.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.speedboat4: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 12.7mm Heavy Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 500RPM$(br)Damage - 25$(br)Ammo - $(item)Heavy Ammo$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.ah_61: $(thing)AH-6 Little Bird$() is a light helicopter carrying 4 crew members, with weak armor protection. Carries 4 flare countermeasures to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing flares one by one over time.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.ah_62: Requires at least 5 x 5 x 3 space for placement.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.ah_64: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 20mm Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 500RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 25$(br)Explosion Damage - 13$(br)Explosion Radius - 4m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Shells$()$(br)(2) 70mm Rocket$(br)Direct Damage - 80$(br)Explosion Damage - 40$(br)Explosion Radius - 5m$(br)Ammo - $(item)70mm Rocket$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.a_10a1: $(thing)A-10A Thunderbolt II$() is a single seat attacker with medium armor protection. Carries 4 flare countermeasures to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing flares one by one over time.$(p)Press $(thing)$(k:key.jump)$() to operate landing gears, $(thing)$(k:key.sneak)$() to open speed brake, $(thing)$(k:key.sprint)$() to enable boost.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.a_10a2: Requires at least 7 x 7 x 4 space for placement.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.a_10a3: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 350$(br)Max Passengers - 1$(br)Climbing Height - 0.5m$(br)Max Energy - 1,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 256FE/tick$(br)Max Speed - 180km/h (No boost) / 300km/h (Boost)
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.a_10a4: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 30mm Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 600RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 30$(br)Explosion Damage - 10$(br)Explosion Radius - 4m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Shells$()$(br)(2) 70mm Rocket$(br)Fire Rate - 120RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 90$(br)Explosion Damage - 50$(br)Explosion Radius - 6m$(br)Ammo - $(item)70mm Rocket$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.a_10a5: (3) MK-82 Aerial Bomb$(br)Explosion Damage - 650$(br)Explosion Radius - 11m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Medium Aerial Bomb$()$(br)(4) AGM-65 Air-to-ground Missile$(br)Direct Damage - 1100$(br)Explosion Damage - 150$(br)Explosion Radius - 9m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Air-to-ground Missile$()
